articles.description: Novak Djokovic scored the 1,000th match win of his illustrious career Saturday, joining
articles.content:
Julian Finney/Getty Images
Novak Djokovic scored the 1,000th match win of his illustrious career Saturday, joining an exclusive group of men's tennis players.
Djokovic's 1,000th win came via a 6-4,… [+1941 chars]

articles.content: The New Orleans Saints just added another weapon to their offense by signing free agent wide receiver Jarvis Landry. Yes, thats right another Louisiana native and LSU Tiger is coming home! The 29-yea… [+1229 chars]

articles.title: In 76ers' biggest game of the year, James Harden turned into Ben Simmons - NBC Sports
articles.description: Much like Ben Simmons did last season, James Harden disappeared for the Sixers in their biggest game of the season. By Reuben Frank
articles.content: The 76ers got rid of Ben Simmons for a few reasons but largely because he refused to shoot the basketball in the second half of the biggest game of last year, a home elimination game in the conferenc… [+3834 chars]
